Name: SLDF 19th Army
Details: The Star League Defense Force (SLDF)'s 19th Army, was the garrison force for the Taurian Concordat during the Star League and was heavily damaged during the Periphery Uprising due to insurgent attacks, some with weapons of mass attack destruction. General Aleksandr Kerensky was leading the 19th Army when the Amaris Coup took place in Terra in 2765, with parts of the 19th following him through all the way in the crusade to liberate Terra from the Usurper.
